snippet: The change, part of a broader tax-cut measure, extends to live theater a benefit already provided to the film and television industries.
abstract: Congress approves to extend tax benefit enjoyed by movies and television productions to include live shows; change should encourage investment in Broadway plays by ending income tax payments on ‘phantom profits,' which is money returned to investors that is less than amount initially invested.
lead_paragraph: The change, part of a broader tax-cut measure, extends to live theater a benefit already provided to the film and television industries.

headline.main: Broadway Tax Benefit Approved by Congress
